titleInfo.title: Angular distribution of photoelectrons ejected from HI by polarised coherent VUV radiation
Journal of Physics, B: Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics

bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Mank A, Drescher M, Huth-Fehre T, Schönhense G, Böwering N, Heinzmann U (1989)
Angular distribution of photoelectrons ejected from HI by polarised coherent VUV radiation.
Journal of Physics, B: Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics 22(17): L487-L491.
